organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: " I bear witness that there is no God but Allah and I bear witness that the prophet Mohammed is the messenger of God , " he quoted Mills as saying .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Allah |
| God |
| Prophet Mohammed |
| Messenger of God |

Explanation:

In the given paragraph, there are two organizations mentioned: Allah (God) and Prophet Mohammed (Messenger of God). Mills is quoting these organizations, so they are the valid entities to include in the table.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Allah |
| God |
| Prophet Mohammed |
| Messenger of God |

Explanation:

In the given paragraph, the entities "Allah" and "God" refer to the same organization, which is a monotheistic deity. "Prophet Mohammed" and "Messenger of God" refer to the same organization, which is the religious and prophetic title of Muhammad. Therefore, both sets of words refer to the same organization and should be included in the table. "I" and "he" are not organizations and should not be included. "Quoted Mills as saying" is a phrase indicating the source of the quote and should also be excluded.
